description: "The Bomber Will Not Always Get Through"
requirements: Destroy "Flamewind Feathers" launched by the Goldflame Qucusaur Tyrant twice during a single challenge.
Use an exploding Flamegranate to trigger the Melt reaction on the Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King.
Use an exploding Flamegranate to defeat the Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King.

description: "It Is Too Late for You, Inorganics."
requirements: Defeat the Secret Source Automaton: Configuration Device while it is stunned.
Defeat the Tenebrous Papilla while it is replicating the forms of a Primo Geovishap, a Jadeplume Terrorshroom, and the Millennial Pearl Seahorse respectively.

description: Good Thing I'm a Cut Above
requirements: Destroy a total of 8 Radiant Reflections created by the Wayward Hermetic Spiritspeaker during a single challenge.
Defeat the Lord of Eroded Primal Fire when the battlefield has been reduced to its smallest size.
